affectAllWarn: This plugin replacing installation directory files and it will affect all workspaces!
replaceSubtitle: Replace the startup interface with the Genshin Launcher
recoverSubtitle: Restore the startup interface to SiYuan default
recoverBtnTitle1: Reason: Original backup resources not found
recoverBtnTitle2: Reason: Please perform replace operation first
reinstallInfo: Reinstalling SiYuan can fully restore，adapted to v2.10.2，higher or lower version may have compatative problem, please report by Github Issue
activated: Genshin, Start! Restart or lock Siyuan to see the effects
deactivated: Genshin, Stop! Restart or lock Siyuan to see the effects
